content: an easy knit pullover with a top down construction looks great when worked up in a self-striping yarn like caron cotton cakes to fit bust measurement xs/m 28 -34 71 cm - 86 5 cm l/xl 36 -38 91 5 cm - 96 5 cm 2/3xl 40 -42 101 5 cm - 106 5 cm finished bust xs/m 38 96 5 cm l/xl 45 114 5 cm 2/3xl 50 127 cm also at let s knit 1 1 https //www letsknit co uk/free-knitting-patterns/caron-cotton-cakes-top-pattern
